en_us: Adds the shamir 'Audere' to Metallurgy. Gain Haste with low durability tools.
Audere buffs mining speed, as durability decreases.

The Audere Shamir is found on Barium Bands. It can be placed onto tools.

Higher levels of Haste are awarded for lower durability (percentage-based).

The maximum level of Haste is IV.
